flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: • [== URL ==|Hit <enter> to insert another list item, and <enter> twice in a row to end the list. To get sub-items, repeat the bullet character once for each level of indent you want (e.g. **)]
guide.introduction_rendered: • [== URL ==|Hit <enter> to insert another list item, and <enter> twice in a row to end the list. To get sub-items, repeat the bullet character once for each level of indent you want (e.g. **)]
guide.summary: The Palm  tree in my backyard sheds really cool shaped pieces of bark, and they always look like masks to me ( I'm creepy like that) o This year I saved up a few and made them into Halloween Decor for our Halloween art show at the Hoodoo Voodoo Halloween
guide.title: Hand Painted Palm Masks
